summary: The client requested to remove all existing sprint plans and start fresh with a new one, but the SPRINT_PLANNING_ARCHITECT encountered repeated HTTP POST errors to the sprint API due to a missing Sprint ID.

actions.task: Fix API calls by providing required Sprint ID for deletion or planning operations

risks.risk: Sprint management API failing with INVALID_REQUEST error due to missing Sprint ID
risks.mitigation: Ensure Sprint ID is included in all relevant API POST requests before retrying operations
